original_text: His children are far from safety, and they are crushed in the gate, neither is there any to deliver them.
korean_text: 그의 자식들은 구원에서 멀고 성문에서 억눌리나 구하는 자가 없으며

sentences.original_text: His children are far from safety
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 자녀들은 안전에서 멀리 떨어져 있으며

sentences.original_text: and they are crushed in the gate
neither is there any to deliver them
